description: Great game! Though I may well be the first person to lose on level 1. I pressed run and immediately tripped over my desk and sprained my ankle. Solid 5/7 will play again!

not only is this a game , and lets you stay fit wherever you are but 
it doubles as a way to keep your laptop from sleeping when you
close the lid AND a stopwatch so you have 3 functionalitys in 1 
app 100 out of 10 an absolute necessity when trying to get 
all office desktop functionality into linux laptops with limited
storage space  , also you have not lived until you used linux 
laptops at work

Not only is this app not a game, but the same functionality could be done with a stopwatch app on your phone. Even my wrist watch has a stopwatch function! I get that Office Runner is supposed to be a joke to begin with, but I feel like nobody has ever used it for its intended purpose seeing as how this is a Linux exclusive app and nobody uses Linux laptops at their office. I'm giving this "game" 1 star for multiple reasons. For one, it's hardly even a game, and two, I'm just sick of seeing this game so high up in the games category in GNOME Software.
Please add button "clear records", for delete records without reinstall app...
No es más que un cronómetro, no debería ni estar catalogada como juego.
summary: No es más que un cronómetro
